name: Slices of Cake
pages: All these brand new cake slices can be obtained by cutting their respective cakes with a cutting board.$(br)You can also use alchemy with cake slices instead of cake for the respective slices.

pages.text: Nothing special from this simple slice of apple cake.
Eating this will give Speed for 7.5 seconds.
This one will give Weakness II and Slowness for 10 seconds.
Eating one will apply Instant Health, how nice!
Eating one will burn you for 4 seconds.
Not sure what you expected here. It's an upside down piece of cake.
Absorption for 17.5 seconds and Regeneration for 10. Too bad you need a fuchsia cake in the first place.
Grants Blindness for 15 seconds and Invisibility for only 10. Great when you're in a bind.
It's made of chocolate, what more do you want?
Come in 3 flavors, dual, prospit and derse.$(br)We all know which one is superior.
